name: Iron Sword
looks: The iron sword has a blade made of dark iron with a sharp edge. The handle is wrapped in leather for a firm grip.

name: Rusty Dagger
description: A small and worn-out dagger with a rusty blade.
looks: The rusty dagger is a small weapon with a worn and chipped wooden handle. The blade is covered in rust and shows signs of heavy use.

special_weapon_skills.dagger: Grants a bonus to Dagger skill when wielded.

name: Warhammer
description: A heavy two-handed hammer designed for crushing opponents.
looks: The warhammer is a massive weapon with a long handle made of sturdy oak wood. The head of the hammer is made of solid iron and has large, blunt spikes on one side.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a double-edged design. The hilt is made of wood wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_effects.bleed: Has a chance to cause bleeding on hit.

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old and worn sword with a rusty blade
looks: The rusty sword has a worn hilt and a blade covered in rust. It has seen better days, but it still has enough sharpness to be usable in battle.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Sturdy steel gauntlets that provide good protection for the hands and forearms.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of solid steel with a dark, metallic finish. They cover the hands and extend up to the forearms, providing full coverage and protection.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy and sharp sword made from steel.
looks: The steel sword has a long, straight blade with a sharp edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a firm grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when used.

name: Steel Gloves
description: Durable gloves made of steel that provide protection for the hands.
looks: The steel gloves are made of hardened steel plates that cover the back of the hand and fingers. The palms are made of reinforced leather for flexibility and grip.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword meant for close combat.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single edge. The hilt is made of leather and has a basic crossguard. The pommel is rounded and made of iron.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy gauntlets made of durable steel
looks: The steel gauntlets are solid and bulky, providing excellent protection for the hands and wrists. They have reinforced knuckles and finger joints.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Mithril Sword
description: A legendary sword made from the precious metal Mithril. It is said to be incredibly sharp and light, making it an excellent weapon for skilled warriors.
looks: The Mithril Sword has a gleaming silver blade with a faint blue tint. The hilt is wrapped in dark leather, providing a comfortable grip. Runes and enchantments are etched along the blade, giving it an ethereal glow.

special_weapon_skills.swordmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordmanship skill when wielded.

special_effects.sharpness: Increases the chance of dealing critical hits.

name: Sword of the King
description: A legendary sword that once belonged to the king. It is said to possess great power and is imbued with the essence of a long-lost civilization.
looks: The sword has a long, slender blade made of shining steel. The hilt is wrapped in intricate leather and adorned with ancient symbols. The pommel is a large gemstone that emits a faint glow.

special_weapon_skills.sword_mastery: Grants a bonus to Sword Mastery skill when equipped.

special_effects.empower: Has a chance to empower the wielder's attacks with elemental damage.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy steel gauntlets that provide excellent hand protection.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of solid steel with a intricate engravings on their surface. They have a gauntlet-style design that covers the hand and extends up to the forearm.

name: Magic Staff
description: A powerful staff infused with arcane energy.
looks: The magic staff is made from a polished wood, adorned with intricate carvings and embedded with glowing crystals. It has a length of about 6 feet and a curved top with a crystal orb.

special_weapon_skills.Arcane Mastery: Increases damage and effectiveness of arcane spells.

special_effects.Arcane Channeling: Allows the user to channel additional arcane energy into spells, increasing their power.
